heading: Patch 2.1.3 Hotfix 1 â€“ March 6, 2025
content: There's a hotfix for Patch 2.1.3 and March of the Goblins event! Check it out! As you know Season of Witchcraft has been here for some time already and while the is making sure everything stays on point, news and hotfixes keep coming! Indeed, Blizzard just released the Diablo 4 Season 7 Patch 2.1.3 Hotfix 1 to fix some bugs with March of the Goblins event! There are some known issues with Nvidia drivers that are looked into as we speak: We hope you enjoy the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus for the Season 7 is to make sure our are always solid with all the new item updates, new features and mechanic changes. And we're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
